snippet: Sarah Murnaghan, 10, who has cystic fibrosis, underwent successful surgery at Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia, a family spokeswoman said.
abstract: Sarah Murnaghan, girl whose efforts to qualify for lung donation drew debate over how organs are allocated, receives double-lung transplant after being matched with an adult donor.
lead_paragraph: Sarah Murnaghan, 10, who has cystic fibrosis, underwent successful surgery at Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia, a family spokeswoman said.
